body_html:
What is the easiest way for me to reproduce some of these environments that are failing? Docker images that I can load perhaps?

Yes, see https://github.com/pytorch/ossci-job-dsl PM me on Slack for more info

BTW, I'm surprised you can't repro, it's failing on every config here, it should fail for your config too.

body:
> What is the easiest way for me to reproduce some of these environments that are failing? Docker images that I can load perhaps?

Yes, see https://github.com/pytorch/ossci-job-dsl PM me on Slack for more info

BTW, I'm surprised you can't repro, it's failing on every config here, it should fail for your config too.
